module.name: filesystem
module.required: Contains the initial SID for the filesystems.

interface.name: fs_type
interface.summary: Transform specified type into a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_noxattr_type
interface.summary: Transform specified type into a filesystem type which does not have extended attribute support.

interface.name: fs_associate
interface.summary: Associate the specified file type to persistent filesystems with extended attributes. This allows a file of this type to be created on a filesystem such as ext3, JFS, and XFS.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: The type of the to be associated.

interface.name: fs_associate_noxattr
interface.summary: Associate the specified file type to filesystems which lack extended attributes support. This allows a file of this type to be created on a filesystem such as FAT32, and NFS.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: The type of the to be associated.

interface.name: fs_exec_noxattr
interface.summary: Execute files on a filesystem that does not support extended attributes.

interface.name: fs_mount_xattr_fs
interface.summary: Mount a persistent filesystem which has extended attributes, such as ext3, JFS, or XFS.

interface.name: fs_remount_xattr_fs
interface.summary: Remount a persistent filesystem which has extended attributes, such as ext3, JFS, or XFS. This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_xattr_fs
interface.summary: Unmount a persistent filesystem which has extended attributes, such as ext3, JFS, or XFS.

interface.name: fs_getattr_xattr_fs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a persistent filesystem which has extended attributes, such as ext3, JFS, or XFS.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_getattr_xattr_fs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of a persistent filesystem which has extended attributes, such as ext3, JFS, or XFS.

interface.name: fs_relabelfrom_xattr_fs
interface.summary: Allow changing of the label of a filesystem with extended attributes using the context= mount option.

interface.name: fs_get_xattr_fs_quotas
interface.summary: Get the filesystem quotas of a filesystem with extended attributes.

interface.name: fs_set_xattr_fs_quotas
interface.summary: Set the filesystem quotas of a filesystem with extended attributes.

interface.name: fs_mount_autofs
interface.summary: Mount an automount pseudo filesystem.

interface.name: fs_remount_autofs
interface.summary: Remount an automount pseudo filesystem This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_autofs
interface.summary: Unmount an automount pseudo filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_autofs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of an automount pseudo filesystem.

interface.name: fs_search_auto_mountpoints
interface.summary: Search automount filesystem to use automatically mounted filesystems.

interface.name: fs_list_auto_mountpoints
interface.summary: Read directories of automatically mounted filesystems.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_list_auto_mountpoints
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list directories of automatically mounted filesystems.

interface.name: fs_manage_autofs_symlinks
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete symbolic links on an autofs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_binfmt_misc_dirs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of directories on binfmt_misc filesystems.

interface.name: fs_register_binary_executable_type
interface.summary: Register an interpreter for new binary file types, using the kernel binfmt_misc support.

desc.p: Register an interpreter for new binary file types, using the kernel binfmt_misc support.
A common use for this is to register a JVM as an interpreter for Java byte code. Registered binaries can be directly executed on a command line without specifying the interpreter.

interface.name: fs_mount_cifs
interface.summary: Mount a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_remount_cifs
interface.summary: Remount a CIFS or SMB network filesystem. This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_cifs
interface.summary: Unmount a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_cifs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_search_cifs
interface.summary: Search directories on a CIFS or SMB filesystem.

interface.name: fs_list_cifs
interface.summary: List the contents of directories on a CIFS or SMB filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_list_cifs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list the contents of directories on a CIFS or SMB filesystem.

interface.name: fs_read_cifs_files
interface.summary: Read files on a CIFS or SMB filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_noxattr_fs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of filesystems that do not have extended attribute support.

interface.name: fs_list_noxattr_fs
interface.summary: Read all noxattrfs directories.

interface.name: fs_manage_noxattr_fs_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete all noxattrfs directories.

interface.name: fs_read_noxattr_fs_files
interface.summary: Read all noxattrfs files.

interface.name: fs_manage_noxattr_fs_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete all noxattrfs files.

interface.name: fs_read_noxattr_fs_symlinks
interface.summary: Read all noxattrfs symbolic links.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_read_cifs_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read files on a CIFS or SMB filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_rw_cifs_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write files on a CIFS or SMB filesystem.

interface.name: fs_read_cifs_symlinks
interface.summary: Read symbolic links on a CIFS or SMB filesystem.

interface.name: fs_exec_cifs_files
interface.summary: Execute files on a CIFS or SMB network filesystem, in the caller domain.

interface.name: fs_manage_cifs_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete directories on a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_manage_cifs_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to create, read, write, and delete directories on a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_cifs_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete files on a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_manage_cifs_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to create, read, write, and delete files on a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_cifs_symlinks
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete symbolic links on a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_cifs_named_pipes
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete named pipes on a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_cifs_named_sockets
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete named sockets on a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_cifs_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a file on a CIFS or SMB filesystem in the specified domain.

desc.p: Execute a file on a CIFS or SMB filesystem in the specified domain. This allows the specified domain to execute any file on these filesystems in the specified domain. This is not suggested.
No interprocess communication (signals, pipes, etc.) is provided by this interface since the domains are not owned by this module.
This interface was added to handle home directories on CIFS/SMB filesystems, in particular used by the ssh-agent policy.

param.name: target_domain
param.summary: The type of the new process.

interface.name: fs_mount_dos_fs
interface.summary: Mount a DOS filesystem, such as FAT32 or NTFS.

interface.name: fs_remount_dos_fs
interface.summary: Remount a DOS filesystem, such as FAT32 or NTFS. This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_dos_fs
interface.summary: Unmount a DOS filesystem, such as FAT32 or NTFS.

interface.name: fs_getattr_dos_fs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a DOS filesystem, such as FAT32 or NTFS.

interface.name: fs_relabelfrom_dos_fs
interface.summary: Allow changing of the label of a DOS filesystem using the context= mount option.

interface.name: fs_read_dos_files
interface.summary: Read files on a DOS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_dos_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete files on a DOS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_read_eventpollfs
interface.summary: Read eventpollfs files.

desc.p: This interface has been deprecated, and will be removed in the future.

interface.name: fs_search_inotifyfs
interface.summary: Search inotifyfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_list_inotifyfs
interface.summary: List inotifyfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_mount_iso9660_fs
interface.summary: Mount an iso9660 filesystem, which is usually used on CDs.

interface.name: fs_remount_iso9660_fs
interface.summary: Remount an iso9660 filesystem, which is usually used on CDs. This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_iso9660_fs
interface.summary: Unmount an iso9660 filesystem, which is usually used on CDs.

interface.name: fs_getattr_iso9660_fs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of an iso9660 filesystem, which is usually used on CDs.

interface.name: fs_read_iso9660_files
interface.summary: Read files on an iso9660 filesystem, which is usually used on CDs.

interface.name: fs_mount_nfs
interface.summary: Mount a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_remount_nfs
interface.summary: Remount a NFS filesystem. This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_nfs
interface.summary: Unmount a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_nfs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_search_nfs
interface.summary: Search directories on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_list_nfs
interface.summary: List NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_list_nfs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list the contents of directories on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_read_nfs_files
interface.summary: Read files on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_read_nfs_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read files on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_write_nfs_files
interface.summary: Read files on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_exec_nfs_files
interface.summary: Execute files on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_rw_nfs_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write files on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_read_nfs_symlinks
interface.summary: Read symbolic links on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_rpc_dirs
interface.summary: Read directories of RPC file system pipes.

interface.name: fs_search_rpc
interface.summary: Search directories of RPC file system pipes.

interface.name: fs_search_removable
interface.summary: Search removable storage directories.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_list_removable
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list removable storage directories.

interface.name: fs_read_removable_files
interface.summary: Read removable storage files.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_read_removable_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read removable storage files.

interface.name: fs_read_removable_symlinks
interface.summary: Read removable storage symbolic links.

interface.name: fs_list_rpc
interface.summary: Read directories of RPC file system pipes.

interface.name: fs_read_rpc_files
interface.summary: Read files of RPC file system pipes.

interface.name: fs_read_rpc_symlinks
interface.summary: Read symbolic links of RPC file system pipes.

interface.name: fs_read_rpc_sockets
interface.summary: Read sockets of RPC file system pipes.

interface.name: fs_manage_nfs_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete directories on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_manage_nfs_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to create, read, write, and delete directories on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_nfs_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete files on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_manage_nfs_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to create, read, write, and delete files on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_nfs_symlinks
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete symbolic links on a CIFS or SMB network filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_nfs_named_pipes
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete named pipes on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_nfs_named_sockets
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete named sockets on a NFS filesystem.

interface.name: fs_nfs_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a file on a NFS filesystem in the specified domain.

desc.p: Execute a file on a NFS filesystem in the specified domain. This allows the specified domain to execute any file on a NFS filesystem in the specified domain. This is not suggested.
No interprocess communication (signals, pipes, etc.) is provided by this interface since the domains are not owned by this module.
This interface was added to handle home directories on NFS filesystems, in particular used by the ssh-agent policy.

param.name: target_domain
param.summary: The type of the new process.

interface.name: fs_mount_nfsd_fs
interface.summary: Mount a NFS server pseudo filesystem.

interface.name: fs_remount_nfsd_fs
interface.summary: Mount a NFS server pseudo filesystem. This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_nfsd_fs
interface.summary: Unmount a NFS server pseudo filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_nfsd_fs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a NFS server pseudo filesystem.

interface.name: fs_search_nfsd_fs
interface.summary: Search NFS server directories.

interface.name: fs_rw_nfsd_fs
interface.summary: Read and write NFS server files.

interface.name: fs_mount_ramfs
interface.summary: Mount a RAM filesystem.

interface.name: fs_remount_ramfs
interface.summary: Remount a RAM filesystem. This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_ramfs
interface.summary: Unmount a RAM filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_ramfs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a RAM filesystem.

interface.name: fs_search_ramfs
interface.summary: Search directories on a ramfs

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_search_ramfs
interface.summary: Dontaudit Search directories on a ramfs

interface.name: fs_manage_ramfs_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete directories on a ramfs.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_read_ramfs_files
interface.summary: Dontaudit read on a ramfs files.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_read_ramfs_pipes
interface.summary: Dontaudit read on a ramfs fifo_files.

interface.name: fs_manage_ramfs_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete files on a ramfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_write_ramfs_pipes
interface.summary: Write to named pipe on a ramfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_write_ramfs_pipes
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to write to named pipes on a ramfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_rw_ramfs_pipes
interface.summary: Read and write a named pipe on a ramfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_ramfs_pipes
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete named pipes on a ramfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_write_ramfs_sockets
interface.summary: Write to named socket on a ramfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_manage_ramfs_sockets
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete named sockets on a ramfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_mount_romfs
interface.summary: Mount a ROM filesystem.

interface.name: fs_remount_romfs
interface.summary: Remount a ROM filesystem. This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_romfs
interface.summary: Unmount a ROM filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_romfs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a ROM filesystem.

interface.name: fs_mount_rpc_pipefs
interface.summary: Mount a RPC pipe filesystem.

interface.name: fs_remount_rpc_pipefs
interface.summary: Remount a RPC pipe filesystem. This allows some mount option to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_rpc_pipefs
interface.summary: Unmount a RPC pipe filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_rpc_pipefs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a RPC pipe filesystem.

interface.name: fs_rw_rpc_named_pipes
interface.summary: Read and write RPC pipe filesystem named pipes.

interface.name: fs_mount_tmpfs
interface.summary: Mount a tmpfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_remount_tmpfs
interface.summary: Remount a tmpfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_unmount_tmpfs
interface.summary: Unmount a tmpfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_getattr_tmpfs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a tmpfs filesystem.

interface.name: fs_associate_tmpfs
interface.summary: Allow the type to associate to tmpfs filesystems.

param.name: type
param.summary: The type of the object to be associated.

interface.name: fs_getattr_tmpfs_dirs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of tmpfs directories.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_getattr_tmpfs_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of tmpfs directories.

interface.name: fs_setattr_tmpfs_dirs
interface.summary: Set the attributes of tmpfs directories.

interface.name: fs_search_tmpfs
interface.summary: Search tmpfs directories.

interface.name: fs_list_tmpfs
interface.summary: List the contents of generic tmpfs directories.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_list_tmpfs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list the contents of generic tmpfs directories.

interface.name: fs_manage_tmpfs_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete tmpfs directories

interface.name: fs_tmpfs_filetrans
interface.summary: Create an object in a tmpfs filesystem, with a private type using a type transition.

param.name: private type
param.summary: The type of the object to be created.

param.name: object
param.summary: The object class of the object being created.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_getattr_tmpfs_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to getattr generic tmpfs files.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_rw_tmpfs_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write generic tmpfs files.

interface.name: fs_manage_auto_mountpoints
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete auto moutpoints.

interface.name: fs_rw_tmpfs_files
interface.summary: Read and write generic tmpfs files.

interface.name: fs_read_tmpfs_symlinks
interface.summary: Read tmpfs link files.

interface.name: fs_rw_tmpfs_chr_files
interface.summary: Read and write character nodes on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_use_tmpfs_chr_dev
interface.summary: dontaudit Read and write character nodes on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_relabel_tmpfs_chr_file
interface.summary: Relabel character nodes on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_rw_tmpfs_blk_files
interface.summary: Read and write block nodes on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_relabel_tmpfs_blk_file
interface.summary: Relabel block nodes on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_manage_tmpfs_files
interface.summary: Read and write, create and delete generic files on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_manage_tmpfs_symlinks
interface.summary: Read and write, create and delete symbolic links on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_manage_tmpfs_sockets
interface.summary: Read and write, create and delete socket files on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_manage_tmpfs_chr_files
interface.summary: Read and write, create and delete character nodes on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_manage_tmpfs_blk_files
interface.summary: Read and write, create and delete block nodes on tmpfs filesystems.

interface.name: fs_mount_all_fs
interface.summary: Mount all filesystems.

interface.name: fs_remount_all_fs
interface.summary: Remount all filesystems. This allows some mount options to be changed.

interface.name: fs_unmount_all_fs
interface.summary: Unmount all filesystems.

interface.name: fs_getattr_all_fs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all persistent filesystems.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_getattr_all_fs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes all filesystems.

interface.name: fs_get_all_fs_quotas
interface.summary: Get the quotas of all filesystems.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain getting quotas.

interface.name: fs_set_all_quotas
interface.summary: Set the quotas of all filesystems.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain setting quotas.

interface.name: fs_relabelfrom_all_fs
interface.summary: Relabelfrom all filesystems.

interface.name: fs_getattr_all_dirs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all directories with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_search_all
interface.summary: Search all directories with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_list_all
interface.summary: List all directories with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_getattr_all_files
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all files with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_getattr_all_symlinks
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all symbolic links with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_getattr_all_pipes
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all named pipes with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_getattr_all_sockets
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all named sockets with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_getattr_all_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all files with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_getattr_all_symlinks
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all symbolic links with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_getattr_all_pipes
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all named pipes with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_dontaudit_getattr_all_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all named sockets with a filesystem type.

interface.name: fs_unconfined
interface.summary: Unconfined access to filesystems

interface.name: fs_relabelfrom_noxattr_fs
interface.summary: Relabel all objets from filesystems that do not support extended attributes.
